articles.title: Power Rankings 2022: Yankees hold off Astros - MLB.com
articles.description:
If the postseason began today, four of five teams from the American League East would be in.
Let’s assume for now that the Yankees run away with the division, which looks likely, given their 13-game lead over the second-place Red Sox. That leaves Boston, Toro…

articles.author: Farrah Tomazin
articles.title: 309th mass shooting this year: America’s gun violence epidemic - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: The rampage in Highland Park, Chicago, came on July 4, the day Americans are meant to take to the streets to celebrate the good things about their country.
articles.content: The latest carnage represents the 309th mass shooting so far this year, according to the non-profit Gun Violence Archive, and comes at a time when the countrys social and political divisions have dee… [+3135 chars]
